title: Control variates for stochastic gradient MCMC

tldr.text: An alternative log-posterior gradient estimate is suggested for stochastic gradient MCMC which uses control variates to reduce the variance, and it is shown that a different control-variate technique, known as zero variance control Variates, can be applied to SGMCMC algorithms for free.
